title: Pax East riot booth this year?
body:
No but seriously, i can't go to PAX , so i was grabbing skins from my friends usually, this year i grabbed an archlight velkoz but i forgot to ask if there were any new cool skins going around.

So, did they only give out velkoz this year, aside from the usual riot kayle and blitz obviously.

replies.body: Archlight Vel'Koz was given out via swag bags, and Riot Kayle was given out to cosplayers (and at one of the panels, IIRC.)

Ooo you had the codes in the swag bags?! Does this mean there's a chance that'll be the case for Prime this year as well?
I had some difficulty with finding Rioters that still had skins on them at last year's Prime... And I felt awful for being the billionth person to ask each one I saw.
We did! I'm not sure what the plan is for PAX Prime, but I wouldn't be surprised if it was something similar. :]
Yeah, don't forget to post your used codes so that people from other servers can use them otherwise they just expire.
omg can i have it prob no?{{champion:161}}

Hey buddy! Yes, they only gave out Vel'koz in this year's PAX east. Last time they gave Arcade Miss Fortune and Riot Kayle.

Also, do you still happen to have the code ? If so I'd like to ask if you'd let me use it on LAN! I have no friends in PAX and I Can't go either. hehe.
